title: Queen Rania Al Abdullah | World Bank Live

quotes: Rania Al Yassin was born on August 31, 1970.
She obtained her Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration from the American University of Cairo in 1991.
After marrying Prince Abdullah bin Al Hussein on June 10, 1993, they went on to have four children: Prince Hussein, Princess Iman, Princess Salma, and Prince Hashem.
In 2009, Her Majesty championed the 1 Goal campaign for education;

organizations.name: UN Girl’s Education Initiatives
quotes: In 2009, Her Majesty championed the 1 Goal campaign for education; she is Honorary Chair of the UN Girl’s Education Initiatives and has advocated access to education in forums and gatherings around the world.
